answers.answer: Hello,One possibility that may present this way is sclerederma. It presents as hardening and thickening of the dermal or middle layer of the skin and presents as hard patches on the back. It has been associated with many causes like diabetes, hyperparathyroidism and Sjogren’s syndrome.The other possibility is of lichen sclerosus. I would suggest you to get it examined from a dermatologist. Also get your blood sugar levels estimated.It is very difficult to precisely confirm a diagnosis without examination and investigations and the answer is based on the medical information provided. For exact diagnosis, you are requested to consult your dermatologist. I sincerely hope that helps. Take care and please do keep me posted on how you are doing.
